attributes.action: The government to take action on fuel prices
attributes.additional_details: To help people get back to affording their bills
attributes.background: People are now finding that fuel and electricity are becoming so expensive they cannot afford to heat their homes and run vehicles. Gas prices are effectively driving us all into fuel poverty and the government need to do something about it.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about fuels prices, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

Cut the VAT charged on energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597470

Cut VAT on domestic electricity to zero: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594293

Hold an inquiry into fuel prices and introduce increased regulation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603624

Hold an urgent inquiry into the energy crisis, and remove VAT on fuel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605609
